decision_conditions: The proposed advertisement would represent an incongruous and discordant feature within the streetscene in relation to its size, prominence and illumination which  would have a detrimental impact on the visual amenities of neighbouring residential occupiers and the surrounding area. As such, the proposal is considered to be unacceptable and contrary to the Policy DM10 of the Core Strategy 2012 and the NPPF 2019.

Proposal Description - This has been amended for brevity. Please confirm if you agree, or amend if you disagree with the following description: "Erection of timber shed and extension of paving in rear garden, and installation of bike stand in front garden. External changes to ground floor flat including changes to fenestrations to east and south elevations, replacement of entrance door, installation of a step to entrance door and alterations to entrance cupboard door."
